mapper.insert: insert into intention_custom (id, create_time, update_time, user_id, intention_custom_user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intentionCustomUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into intention_custom
id,
create_time,
update_time,
user_id,
intention_custom_user_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{intentionCustomUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update intention_custom
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
intention_custom_user_id = #{intentionCustomUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select intention_custom.user_id as userId,max(intention_custom.create_time) as createTime from intention_custom left join name_card_look_record on intention_custom.intention_custom_user_id = name_card_look_record.user_id left join car_user on name_card_look_record.user_id = car_user.id where name_card_look_record.card_id = #{cardId}
and name_card_look_record.has_dial = 1
and car_user.phone is not null
group by intention_custom.user_id
having count(*) > 1
order by max(intention_custom.create_time) desc

select
from intention_custom where
user_id in
#{item}
1 = 0
